--- select_tablesample_with_unnest_invalid.sql
SELECT
  *
FROM
  UNNEST(ARRAY<STRUCT<x INT64, y STRING>>[(1, 'foo'), (3, 'bar')]) TABLESAMPLE BERNOULLI (90 PERCENT)

--- AST
&parser.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*parser.Hint)(nil),
  Query: &parser.Select{
    pos:      0,
    Distinct: false,
    AsStruct: false,
    Results:  []parser.SelectItem{
      &parser.Star{
        pos: 9,
      },
    },
    From: &parser.From{
      pos:   11,
      Items: []*parser.FromItem{
        &parser.FromItem{
          Source: &parser.Unnest{
            pos:      18,
            end:      82,
            Implicit: false,
            Expr:     &parser.ArrayLiteral{
              pos:  25,
              end:  81,
              Type: &parser.StructType{
                pos:    31,
                end:    56,
                Fields: []*parser.FieldType{
                  &parser.FieldType{
                    Member: &parser.Ident{
                      pos:  38,
                      end:  39,
                      Name: "x",
                    },
                    Type: &parser.SimpleType{
                      pos:  40,
                      Name: "INT64",
                    },
                  },
                  &parser.FieldType{
                    Member: &parser.Ident{
                      pos:  47,
                      end:  48,
                      Name: "y",
                    },
                    Type: &parser.SimpleType{
                      pos:  49,
                      Name: "STRING",
                    },
                  },
                },
              },
              Values: []parser.Expr{
                &parser.StructLiteral{
                  pos:    58,
                  end:    68,
                  Fields: []*parser.FieldType{},
                  Values: []parser.Expr{
                    &parser.IntLiteral{
                      pos:   59,
                      end:   60,
                      Value: "1",
                    },
                    &parser.StringLiteral{
                      pos:   62,
                      end:   67,
                      Value: "foo",
                    },
                  },
                },
                &parser.StructLiteral{
                  pos:    70,
                  end:    80,
                  Fields: []*parser.FieldType{},
                  Values: []parser.Expr{
                    &parser.IntLiteral{
                      pos:   71,
                      end:   72,
                      Value: "3",
                    },
                    &parser.StringLiteral{
                      pos:   74,
                      end:   79,
                      Value: "bar",
                    },
                  },
                },
              },
            },
            Hint:       (*parser.Hint)(nil),
            As:         (*parser.AsAlias)(nil),
            WithOffset: (*parser.WithOffset)(nil),
          },
          TableSample: &parser.TableSample{
            pos:    83,
            Method: "BERNOULLI",
            Size:   &parser.TableSampleSize{
              pos:   105,
              end:   117,
              Value: &parser.IntLiteral{
                pos:   106,
                end:   108,
                Value: "90",
              },
              Unit: "PERCENT",
            },
          },
        },
      },
    },
    Where:   (*parser.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: (*parser.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*parser.Having)(nil),
    OrderBy: (*parser.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:   (*parser.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT * FROM UNNEST(ARRAY<STRUCT<x INT64, y STRING>>[STRUCT(1, "foo"), STRUCT(3, "bar")]) TABLESAMPLE BERNOULLI(90 PERCENT)
